title: How many illustrations are in a children's book? - Quora

response.answer_text: Depends on the type of book. A children’s picture book on average is 32 pages with illustrations on just about every page (while including double spread page art) while a children’s novel could have a less picture and more words (i.e Redwall). I wrote a children’s book that I’m currently illustrating now. I have 28 pages of story but a total of 30 illustrations was included.
